Class QuestionBoard

java.lang.Object
com.bitbybit.model.QuestionBoard
public class QuestionBoard extends Object
Represents the Jeopardy game board, managing a collection of Questions. It provides methods to retrieve categories, available question values within categories, specific questions, and to mark questions as answered.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    QuestionBoard(List<Question> questions)
    Constructs a new QuestionBoard with the given list of questions.

  • Constructor Details

    • QuestionBoard

      public QuestionBoard(List<Question> questions)
      Constructs a new QuestionBoard with the given list of questions.
      Parameters:
      questions - A list of Question objects to populate the board.

  • Method Details

    • getCategories

      public List<String> getCategories()
      Retrieves a sorted list of all unique categories present on the board. The categories are returned in their original format.
      Returns:
      A List of category names (Strings), sorted alphabetically.

    • getAvailableValues

      public List<Integer> getAvailableValues(String category)
      Retrieves a sorted list of available point values for questions within a specific category. Only values for unanswered questions in the given category are returned. The category matching is case-insensitive and space-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      category - The category name to search for.
      Returns:
      A List of available integer values, sorted numerically.

    • getQuestion

      public Question getQuestion(String category, int value)
      Retrieves a specific Question from the board based on its category and value. Only unanswered questions are considered. The category matching is case-insensitive and space-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      category - The category of the question.
      value - The point value of the question.
      Returns:
      The matching Question object, or null if not found or already answered.

    • markQuestionAsAnswered

      public void markQuestionAsAnswered(String category, int value)
      Marks a specific question as answered. The category matching is case-insensitive and space-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      category - The category of the question to mark.
      value - The point value of the question to mark.

    • isBoardEmpty

      public boolean isBoardEmpty()
      Checks if all questions on the board have been answered.
      Returns:
      true if all questions are answered, false otherwise.

    • getAvailableQuestions

      public List<Question> getAvailableQuestions(String category)
      Retrieves a list of all available (unanswered) questions within a specific category. The category matching is case-insensitive and space-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      category - The category name to search for.
      Returns:
      A List of available Question objects in the specified category.
